statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(unit_price * quantity) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, unit_price * quantity AS total_price FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC, unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_products >= 3;
SELECT product_id, AVG(unit_price) AS average_price, MAX(unit_price) AS max_price FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity*unit_price AS total_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales_data;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2023-01-01' AND forecasted_demand < 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price >= 10;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity < 100;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, order_quantity, order_amount FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_quantity DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT sd.order_id, pd.product_name, df.forecast_quantity FROM sales_data sd JOIN product_data pd ON sd.product_id = pd.product_id JOIN demand_forecast df ON sd.product_id = df.product_id WHERE df.forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_info WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered, total_sales_amount FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_quantity BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_status, order_total_amount FROM order_history WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_info WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_sales_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, order_date, order_total_amount FROM order_history INNER JOIN product_info ON order_history.product_id = product_info.product_id;
SELECT product_id, MAX(forecasted_quantity) AS max_forecasted_quantity FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecasted_demand >= 500 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM SalesData WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name, Orders.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC, Orders.quantity ASC;
